## MarkedListProps.rtlLineReversed property

Set the line layout in `flexDirection: 'row-reverse'` and left-align the marker box.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
rtlLineReversed?: boolean;
```

## Remarks

Will be ignored if `I18nManager.isRTL` is `true`<!-- -->.
